sense.def:
A brain
je organ v človeški glavi, ki človeku omogoča, da misli in čuti, na primer vročino in bolečino.

Z besedo
brain
opisujemo tudi um in način razmišljanja.

seg.quote: He had one clear wish in his confused brain.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
has brains
ali
has a good brain
, se je sposoben hitro učiti in razumeti stvari, reševati probleme in se pametno odločati.

seg.quote: He'd got brains but wouldn't use them.
She has a very capable business brain.
Not even the great brains of Cambridge can solve his problem.
She was the brains of the company.

sense.def:
To pick someone's brains
pomeni nekoga prositi, naj nam pomaga pri kakšnem problemu, ker o tistem vprašanju veliko ve;

B.xr:
to
rack
your
brains:
glej
rack
